about_the_game:
Monster and Snakes are Action and adventure Game. Man walk and collects coins and timants and sword , Arrows. You can destroy sworts and arrows Snakes and monsters. The game has good sides are no brutality or bloodshed.

Game are Adventure and Action game.

Enemies are ghosts and snakes and other monsters.

You can destroy enemies sword and arrows.

Game have 7 Levels

You can jump levels and destroy Enemies.

Gameplay are easy and fits beginers / Starters and older players.

The game is well suited for children.

Game language is English.

Game functions: move foward and back , jump , use 2 weapons sword and arrow throws.

Deep in the jungle, a brave man embarked on an adventure filled with monsters and snakes. Armed with a sword and a quiver full of arrows, he set out to explore the mysterious lands in search of treasure.

As he walked through the dense foliage, the man came across glittering coins and shimmering diamonds scattered along his path. With a keen eye, he collected them all, knowing that they would come in handy on his quest.

Suddenly, a menacing figure emerged from the shadows—a giant snake, its forked tongue flickering in the air. Without hesitation, the man unsheathed his sword and prepared to face the slithering creature. With a swift motion, he struck, defeating the snake with one decisive blow.

Look youtube Monster and Snakes 1,1 Update version video.  Youtube link on the Left side of the page

You can play keyboard Arrows and Keys A , S , D , F

Game works Win 10 / 64 Mb.

Memory stick size: 32 GT

2D Game
